metadataAttributes.Title: Writing Winning Resumes and Cover Letters
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: How can you bring your resume to the top of the pile?  How can you present yourself to prospective employers using the language they already speak inside their organization? This course will give you answers to those questions.  You will learn how to convert a boring resume into a dynamic asset statement that conveys your talents in the language that an employer understands.
